name: phonebook_backend
description: Backend for the phonebook application implemented in part2

scripts.build:ui: rd /s /q build && cd ../../part2/phonebook && npm run build && copy -r build ../../part3/Full-Stack-Course-Backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Mikael Laine
